title: Data Science on Weather Datasets
description: Practice on the reading, curation, analysis and proposal of prediction models (logistic regression, decision trees and random forest) to predict rainfall given a weather dataset. Libraries: sklearn, seaborn, pandas, numpy y matplotlib.

title: Monte Carlo Simulations of the adsorption of Hydrogen atoms over Nickel plates
description: Work for my Master's degree thesis in Applied Mathematics in which we simulate the adsorption of hydrogen atoms over nickel plates / surfaces with the goal of study clean energy storage alternatives. Languages: C (simulations y data generation) and Python (visualization)
